Riot API Libraries
==========================

C#
------------------------------------------

`Camille <https://github.com/MingweiSamuel/Camille>`_ (☆ 7)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Fully rate limited, automatic retrying, thread-safe. V4 Supported. Automatic nightly releases.Links
::::::::::::::::

- `NuGet <https://www.nuget.org/packages/MingweiSamuel.Camille/>`_
| License: `LGPL-3.0 <http://choosealicense.com/licenses/lgpl-3.0>`_
| Tags: v3, v4, rate-limiting
| Last Updated: Feb 19, 2019

-----------------

`RiotNet <https://github.com/aj-r/RiotNet>`_ (☆ 18)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

A .NET/C# client for the Riot Games APILinks
::::::::::::::::

- `NuGet <https://www.nuget.org/packages/RiotNet/>`_
- `Documentation <http://aj-r.github.io/RiotNet/docs/interface_riot_net_1_1_i_riot_client.html>`_
| License: `MIT <http://choosealicense.com/licenses/mit>`_
| Tags: v3, rate-limiting
| Last Updated: Jan 27, 2019

-----------------

`CottontailSummoners <https://github.com/ercand/CottontailSummoners>`_ (☆ 0)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

LeagueOfLegends v3 API wrapper. Website in asp.net MVC like www.op.ggLinks
::::::::::::::::

- `NuGet <https://github.com/ercand/CottontailSummoners/>`_
| License: `MIT <http://choosealicense.com/licenses/mit>`_
| Tags: v3, rate-limiter
| Last Updated: Mar 1, 2018

-----------------

`RiotGamesAPI <https://github.com/msx752/RiotGamesAPI>`_ (☆ 2)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Riot Games API Library v3 (all in one)Links
::::::::::::::::

- `AspNetCore <https://www.nuget.org/packages/RiotGamesAPI/>`_
- `NetStandard <https://www.nuget.org/packages/RiotGamesAPI/>`_
- `AspNet <https://www.nuget.org/packages/RiotGamesAPI/>`_
- `Documentation <https://riotgamesapi.readme.io/docs>`_
| License: `MIT <http://choosealicense.com/licenses/mit>`_
| Tags: v3, rate-limiting
| Last Updated: Feb 2, 2018

-----------------

`RiotWrapper.NET <https://github.com/ChristianFreak/RiotWrapper.NET>`_ (☆ 0)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

An asynchronus .NET wrapper for the League of Legends APILinks
::::::::::::::::

- `NuGet <https://www.nuget.org/packages/RiotWrapper.NET/>`_
| License: `MIT <http://choosealicense.com/licenses/mit>`_
| Tags: v3, rate-limiting
| Last Updated: Aug 2, 2017

-----------------

Elixir
------------------------------------------

`godfist <https://github.com/aguxez/godfist>`_ (☆ 3)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Library for League of Legends API in Elixir.Links
::::::::::::::::

- `Documentation <https://hexdocs.pm/godfist/Godfist.html>`_
| License: `MIT <http://choosealicense.com/licenses/mit>`_
| Tags: v3
| Last Updated: Nov 7, 2018

-----------------

Go
------------------------------------------

`riot <https://github.com/yuhanfang/riot>`_ (☆ 19)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Go library for the Riot Games APILinks
::::::::::::::::

- `Documentation <https://github.com/yuhanfang/riot>`_
| License: `Apache-2.0 <http://choosealicense.com/licenses/apache-2.0>`_
| Tags: v3, rate-limiting
| Last Updated: Feb 12, 2019

-----------------

`rg-kit <https://github.com/bbqtd/rg-kit>`_ (☆ 0)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

A Riot Games developer toolkitLinks
::::::::::::::::

- `src <https://github.com/bbqtd/rg-kit>`_
- `Documentation <https://godoc.org/github.com/bbqtd/rg-kit>`_
| License: `MIT <http://choosealicense.com/licenses/mit>`_
| Tags: v3, rate-limiting
| Last Updated: Feb 11, 2018

-----------------

Java
------------------------------------------

`riot-api-java <https://github.com/taycaldwell/riot-api-java>`_ (☆ 153)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Riot Games API Java LibraryLinks
::::::::::::::::

- `JitPack <https://jitpack.io/#rithms/riot-api-java/>`_
- `Website <http://taycaldwell.com/riot-api-java/>`_
| License: `Apache-2.0 <http://choosealicense.com/licenses/apache-2.0>`_
| Tags: v3
| Last Updated: Jan 31, 2019

-----------------

`Zyra <https://github.com/MingweiSamuel/Zyra>`_ (☆ 5)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Fast, Multi-Threaded, Auto-Retrying, Rate-Limited, Highly Tested Riot Games API Lib for JavaLinks
::::::::::::::::

- `Maven <https://search.maven.org/search?q=g:com.mingweisamuel.zyra%20AND%20a:zyra>`_
- `Nightlies <http://www.mingweisamuel.com/Zyra/>`_
- `Javadoc <http://www.mingweisamuel.com/Zyra/apidocs/>`_
| License: `LGPL-3.0 <http://choosealicense.com/licenses/lgpl-3.0>`_
| Tags: v3, rate-limiting
| Last Updated: Aug 11, 2018

-----------------

JavaScript
------------------------------------------

`LeagueJS <https://github.com/Colorfulstan/LeagueJS>`_ (☆ 33)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

A Javascript Wrapper for the League of Legends API Links
::::::::::::::::

- `npm <https://www.npmjs.com/package/leaguejs>`_
- `gitter <https://gitter.im/League-JS/>`_
| License: `MIT <http://choosealicense.com/licenses/mit>`_
| Tags: v3, caching, ddragon, rate-limiting
| Last Updated: Feb 9, 2019

-----------------

`riot-lol-api <https://github.com/Neamar/riot-lol-api>`_ (☆ 11)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

A library tuned to handle with very high volumes of requests to the API (over 1k requests per seconds) over one or many instancesLinks
::::::::::::::::

- `npm <https://www.npmjs.com/package/riot-lol-api>`_
| License: `MIT <http://choosealicense.com/licenses/mit>`_
| Tags: v3, rate-limiting, burst, high-usage
| Last Updated: Feb 8, 2019

-----------------

`TeemoJS <https://github.com/MingweiSamuel/TeemoJS>`_ (☆ 7)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Fast & tiny, automatic retries & smart rate limiting, V4 & champion.gg support, all in 300 lines.Links
::::::::::::::::

- `npm <https://www.npmjs.com/package/teemojs>`_
| License: `LGPL-3.0 <http://choosealicense.com/licenses/lgpl-3.0>`_
| Tags: v3, v4, rate-limiting
| Last Updated: Jan 24, 2019

-----------------

`RiotRateLimiter-node <https://github.com/Colorfulstan/RiotRateLimiter-node>`_ (☆ 5)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

A rate limiter for node-js handling rate-limits enforced by the riot-games apiLinks
::::::::::::::::

- `npm <https://www.npmjs.com/package/riot-ratelimiter>`_
| License: `MIT <http://choosealicense.com/licenses/mit>`_
| Tags: v3, rate-limiting, header-driven, burst, spread, per-region
| Last Updated: Jan 4, 2019

-----------------

`lol-stats-api <https://github.com/danielsogl/lol-stats-api>`_ (☆ 4)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

A ready to use, configurable League of Legends APILinks
::::::::::::::::

- `npm <https://www.npmjs.com/package/lol-stats-api>`_
- `Documentation <https://github.com/danielsogl/lol-stats-api>`_
| License: `MIT <http://choosealicense.com/licenses/mit>`_
| Tags: v3, rate-limiting, caching
| Last Updated: Nov 4, 2017

-----------------

Kotlin
------------------------------------------

`riot-api-android <https://github.com/nspu/riot-api-android>`_ (☆ 1)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

A library to use riot api and datadragon with android. It uses Retrofit and Picasso.Links
::::::::::::::::

- `Github <https://github.com/nspu/riot-api-android>`_
- `Documentation <https://nspu.github.io/riot-api-android/docs/index.html>`_
- `Library (.aar) <https://github.com/nspu/riot-api-android/releases>`_
| License: `MIT <http://choosealicense.com/licenses/mit>`_
| Tags: v3, datadragon, android, caching
| Last Updated: Apr 18, 2018

-----------------

`kotmaw <https://github.com/stelar7/kotmaw>`_ (☆ 4)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

API Wrapper for kotlinLinks
::::::::::::::::

| License: `Apache-2.0 <http://choosealicense.com/licenses/apache-2.0>`_
| Tags: v3, rate-limiting, async, android
| Last Updated: Feb 22, 2018

-----------------

PHP
------------------------------------------

`php-riotapi-request <https://github.com/opgginc/php-riotapi-request>`_ (☆ 10)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

RiotQuest, PHP RiotAPI client library that focused on multi request from OP.GG| License: `MIT <http://choosealicense.com/licenses/mit>`_
| Tags: v3
| Last Updated: Feb 13, 2019

-----------------

`riot-api <https://github.com/dolejska-daniel/riot-api>`_ (☆ 44)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Riot League of Legends & DataDragon API wrapper for PHP7Links
::::::::::::::::

- `GitHub Wiki <https://github.com/dolejska-daniel/riot-api/wiki>`_
- `Packagist <https://packagist.org/packages/dolejska-daniel/riot-api>`_
| License: `GPL-3.0 <http://choosealicense.com/licenses/gpl-3.0>`_
| Tags: v3, v4, rate-limiting
| Last Updated: Feb 6, 2019

-----------------

`league-api <https://github.com/rennokki/league-api>`_ (☆ 0)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

League API is a PHP wrapper of RIOT Games' League of Legends API. This wrapper gives you access to both REST API and Data Dragon in an eloquent way that you'll love!Links
::::::::::::::::

| License: `MIT <http://choosealicense.com/licenses/mit>`_
| Tags: v3
| Last Updated: Nov 26, 2018

-----------------

`LeagueWrap <https://github.com/m1so/LeagueWrap>`_ (☆ 6)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

League of Legend API wrapper for PHP 5.6 and 7+. Supports PSR-6 compatible caching backends and rate-limiting, as well as batch requests.Links
::::::::::::::::

- `Github <https://github.com/m1so/LeagueWrap>`_
- `Packagist <https://packagist.org/packages/m1so/leaguewrap>`_
| License: `MIT <http://choosealicense.com/licenses/mit>`_
| Tags: v3, rate-limiting
| Last Updated: Mar 2, 2018

-----------------

`php-riot-api <https://github.com/kevinohashi/php-riot-api>`_ (☆ 79)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

PHP Wrapper for Riot Games APILinks
::::::::::::::::

| License: `MIT <http://choosealicense.com/licenses/mit>`_
| Tags: v3, rate-limiting
| Last Updated: Feb 12, 2018

-----------------

| Last Updated: Feb 17, 2019

`RiotAPI.grab <https://github.com/pinddFull/RiotAPI.grab>`_ (☆ 1)

Wrapper for the League of Legends public API (typescript)Links

- `npm <https://www.npmjs.com/package/riotapi-grab>`_
- `github <https://github.com/pinddFull/RiotAPI.grab>`_
| License: `MIT <http://choosealicense.com/licenses/mit>`_
| Tags: v3, rate-limiter
| Last Updated: Oct 4, 2018

-----------------

`lol-api-wrapper <https://github.com/danielsogl/lol-api-wrapper>`_ (☆ 2)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

A ready to run LoL API wrapper powered by Express.js and TypeScriptLinks
::::::::::::::::

- `GitHub <https://github.com/danielsogl/lol-api-wrapper>`_
| License: `MIT <http://choosealicense.com/licenses/mit>`_
| Tags: v3, caching, ratelimit, heroku, express, typescript, redis
| Last Updated: Jun 4, 2018
